result.execSummary:
The defendant Susan K Foster was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Susan K Foster is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Susan K Foster was found guilty of Possession of THC [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Susan K Foster was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Susan K Foster in court with attorney Daniel J. Chapman.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 2:37 pm.  Count 1-dismissed.
Count 2-guilty.  Count 3-guilty.  CT-accept pleas, adj guilty & Judgment entered.
SENTENCE:  
Count 2 - W/H sent, probation up to 1 year.  No contact w/ Tyler Funk, Danielle Steffen, Israel Musquiz.  30 days CT, banked for probation, subj to WR but no GT.  Compas & follow recomm.  Notify change of residence, at this time reside at mom's-2646 Long Lake Ln, Luck WI - agent to set rules as to following general rules at mom's home.  Take medications as prescribed in amounts prescribed.  Court costs are waived.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Must report to probation no later than close of business on 10/15.  47 days credit if revoked.
Count 3-Order 30 days PCJ, subj to GT & WR, find 47 days credit, time served.  3:04 pm adj.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 14, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
Scheduling conference on August 29, 2014 at 10:45 am.

Joint Signature Bond with mother - Must reside at mother's residence.  May depart for seeking work with mother or mental health programming/treatment.  If leaves the residence, must report to Polk Co Jail.  Cannot change address w/o further order of court.  NO contact with: Israel Musquiz, Tyler Funk, Danielle Steffen.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Not to commit any new crimes.  Defendant shall neither directly or indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.
